data_table.description: Non-hip and Non-spine Fractures, Original Cohort reviewed through February 2011. There could be multiple records per person. For a unique record, use IDTYPE, ID, FXSITE and FXYEAR.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study paricipant SHARe ID number

variable.name: seq
variable.comment: This variable is a sequential number which describes the order of the fractures if there are more than one fracture in the same location for the same year. For example, FXSITE = 3 and SEQ = 1 means the first forearem/wrist fracture for that FXYEAR. If SEQ were to equal 2 in the above example, it would indicate the second forearm/wrist fracture for that FXYEAR.

variable.name: fxyear
variable.comment: Number of years between year of fracture and exam 1
